committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: Joint resolution designating the week in each year during which Veterans Day is observed as Love America Week.

summary.text: Authorizes and directs the President to proclaim the week in which Veterans Day is observed each year as "Love America Week".

titles.title: Joint resolution designating the week in each year during which Veterans Day is observed as Love America Week.
